Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: doctor dee
Reviews.Content: Bell and Howell was the company that made all the 8mm and 16mm cameras and projectors that my father used for years.  I believed this company would also make an excellent digital camera and bought one for my grandson's birthday.  Unfortunately, Bell and Howell did not live up to its reputation. The camera I bought will not focus and therefore I am returning it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: I got this camera with points acheived through my work. I love this camera, it is far more advanced than any other camera I have used in this price range and size. Cudos to Bell and Howell, you hit a home run with this one....

ProductInfo.Features:
Optical zoom: 3x, Internal memory: 32 MB, SDHC card expandable
Automatic face detection, Movie mode with sound (30 fps)
Shooting modes: 12, Built-in flash, Programmed auto exposure
Frame options: 9, Voice recording and Voice memo in images
Built-in image editing, PictBridge enabled, USB 2.0 ouput
ProductInfo.Name: Bell and Howell Z10T-B ZoomTouch 10.0MP Touchscreen Digital Camera (Black)
